section.p: The administration portal is the Web interface you use to perform all the configuration and administration tasks in , like creating and managing organizations, roles, and marketplaces.
You can access the administration portal in your Web browser using a URL in the following format:

<host_fqdn> is the FQDN or IP address to access as specified in the HOST_FQDN setting in the var.env configuration file, 8081 is the port. oscm-portal is the default context root of and cannot be changed.
You are prompted for the user ID and password. The login page and the initial credentials depend on the selected authentication mode (AUTH_MODE setting in the var.env configration file):

ul.li:
INTERNAL authentication mode:
Login page of
User ID: administrator
Password: admin123
It is recommended that you change the initial password in the administration portal (Change Password page in the Account menu).

OIDC authentication mode:
Login page of the OIDC provider. The page may be skipped if single sign-on is supported and you are already logged in.
User ID: The ID you specified in the ADMIN_USER_ID setting in the var.env configuration file
Password: The password of the user as set in the external authorization system used for authentication. The password can be changed in this system only.

section.p: After login, the operator functionality is available in the Operation menu.
